metadata.title: CVE-2021-45078 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: stab_xcoff_builtin_type in stabs.c in GNU Binutils through 2.37 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) orpossibly have unspecified other impact, as demonstrated by an out-of-boundswrite. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incorrect fix forCVE-2018-12699.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
